text:
Page Two
decided to h ve him to lunch, and Lenny had already made luncheon
date. Since Committee wasn’t to meet in afternoon, we didn’t get
report, and whether it has been followed up or not I do not know.
This letter will have more meaning if I can get, and I shall
try to locate or get from Ralph, copy of documents used at the
meeting.
Ralph reported on FCC visit to Pittsburgh, but didn’t invite
JCET members to attend. I understand it went off well, but don’t
have any report at the moment.
Regards,
Prank E. Schooley
FES:nb
CC: Skomia
